hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
export PATH=$PATH:/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/update-infer/binary/infer/bin/:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/
python client.py checkout
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF # Build Firefox for Android: ac_add_options --enable-application=mobile/android ac_add_options --target=arm-linux-androideabi ac_add_options --enable-artifact-builds ac_add_options --enable-debug
# With the following Android SDK and NDK: ac_add_options --with-android-sdk="/var/lib/jenkins/.mozbuild/android-sdk-linux" #ac_add_options --with-android-ndk="/var/lib/jenkins/.mozbuild/android-ndk-r11b"
# Don't want to have proguard run on it export MOZ_DISABLE_PROGUARD=1
#ac_add_options --enable-artifact-builds
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j24" #HOST_CXX=/var/lib/jenkins/.mozbuild/android-ndk-r11b/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-g++ #HOST_CC=/var/lib/jenkins/.mozbuild/android-ndk-r11b/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc
EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Rebuild all" #OCAMLRUNPARAM=b infer --project_root /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/${JOB_NAME}/build/annotationProcessors/ -o ${JOB_NAME}/ -- make clean all INFER_RESULTS_DIR=fennec-infer/ INFER_OLD_PATH=. OCAMLRUNPARAM=b infer -o ${JOB_NAME}/ run -- make clean all
! DIFF_RESULT=`diff -u ${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/${JOB_NAME}/lastSuccessful/archive/${JOB_NAME}/bugs.txt ${JOB_NAME}/bugs.txt` if test -n "$DIFF_RESULT"; then echo "$DIFF_RESULT"|mail -v -s "${JOB_NAME} changes" sylvestre@mozilla.com michael.l.comella@gmail.com fi
chmod o+rx $(find ${JOB_NAME}/ -type d) chmod -R o+r ${JOB_NAME} rsync -arv -R ${JOB_NAME}/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/reports/ exit 0
